definition: person in charge of a place that ends in 園|园, such as a vineyard 葡萄園|葡萄园, zoo 動物園|动物园, cemetery 陵園|陵园 etc
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: The director of the local zoo says that three monkeys escape from the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 本地動物園的園長說三隻猴子從動物園逃走了。

sentences.english: In our town, the tomatoes grown out of his garden are sweeter than those from any other garden.
sentences.chinese: 在我們鎮裏，他的菜園長出的西紅柿比誰家的都甜。

sentences.english: Seven of those died at the hospital, including Ms. Wu’s mother.
sentences.chinese: 有7人在醫院中不治身亡，包括吳園長的母親。

sentences.english: Please let our rector make the oration first, clap your hands.
sentences.chinese: 首先請大家以熱烈的掌聲歡迎我們園長講話。

sentences.english: what about that downcast man on the park bench?
sentences.chinese: 坐在公園長登上的那個一臉沮喪的男人怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Chongfeng Yue, vice President of Tai Tai Mountain Park, said he aims to create a recreational vehicle museum.
sentences.chinese: 公園副園長說，他目標是創立一個娛樂公交車博物館。

definition: Chung Yuan Christian University, in Taiwan
Wanluan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
(Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
to deliver (a diploma, licence etc)/to qualify
golden years (after the age of about 60)
Hsinyuan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
